name: WorldDriven
description:
World Driven - Democratic Pull Request Management Through Contribution-Based Voting.

World Driven transforms how open source projects handle pull requests by implementing a fair, transparent, and automated merge system based on contributor participation.

How It Works:
- Pull requests are automatically merged after a configurable time period (default: 10 days)
- Contributors can vote on PRs through GitHub's native review system
- Approve a review to speed up the merge
- Request Changes to slow it down or block the merge
- Vote weight is proportional to contributions to the project

Perfect for open source projects with distributed maintainership, teams wanting democratic code review processes, and communities prioritizing contributor empowerment.
